title: Women of the Supreme Court
description: The Supreme Court is the highest court in the United States, and only the most respected and distinguished judges can serve on it. This book will introduce the reader to the four women who have become judges on the Supreme Court and the hard work it took for each one to get there. Meet and get to know Ruth Bader Ginsburg, Sandra Day O'Connor, Sonia Sotomayor, and Elena Kagan.
